posting.title: Los Pollos Hermanos
posting.reqs: mission1, mission2, mission3, mission4, mission5, mission6

mission.posting: Los Pollos Hermanos is a fictional fast food restaurant chain specializing in chicken. There is some rumors that is the front organization for Gus Fring's methamphetamine manufacturing and distribution operation. TAKE IT DOWN!

attachments.note: Use whois and reply with registry domain id
